targets.Name: Sunglasses
targets.bannerText: The booster seat is not secured.
postText: Drivers should keep sunglasses nearby in case the sun gets too bright while driving.
targets.hint: I'm soft but shed all over
Text: FURRY PET (Ex: Dogs, Cats, Hamsters, Guinea Pigs, and Rabbits) are common pet allergens that can trigger asthma symptoms in some people.Pet hair and dander, especially cat hair, can fly in the air and land on surfaces throughout the house...

targets.Name: Beachbear
targets.bannerText: The booster seat is not secured.
postText: Uh oh! Beach Bear tried riding in the front seat, but they are too young.
It is safest for all kids to ride in the backseat at least until they turn 13 years old. Airbags in the front are designed to protect adults and they can be dangerous for kids.
